name: Headlamp Rechargeable 3Pack, 230° Wide Beam LED Headlamp, 7Mode Headlamps for Adults, Head Lamp with Motion Sensor, Red Light Head Lamps LED Rechargeable, Head Lights for Forehead Running Camping

In addition, headlamps for adults rechargeable have the latest sensing function, you can wave your hand to easily control the headlight on and off, enjoy the convenience and avoid any trouble in operation.

Rechargeable Battery & Power Display: The rechargeable headlamp has a built-in large-capacity rechargeable battery that can be fully charged in 2-4 hours via the USB-Type C charging cable. The head lamps led rechargeable can work for 2.5-8 hours in different lighting modes, ensuring that the headlamps can be used for a long time and avoid constant charging. In addition, the power indicator can clearly show the remaining power of the headlamp rechargeable(100%, 75%, 50%, 25%).

Waterproof & Comfortable to Wear: Waterproof headlights ensure that you don't have to worry about sudden rain or snow when using them outdoors. Whether you are camping, exploring, hiking, cycling, fishing, hiking, repairing, or other outdoor or indoor activities, head lights for forehead are your good assistant. The hard hat light features a small size and lightweight design, while also using an adjustable elastic headband that can be easily adjusted for comfortable wearing.

Package List & After-Sales Service: Headlamp with red light kit includes 3* bright headlamp, 3* type-c charging cable, 1* instruction manual and 1* packing box. LED headlamp rechargeable is a good choice for Christmas, Thanksgiving, Father's Day and Mother's Day. If you have any problems with running headlamp, KYEKIO offers a 365-Day New Item Exchange Policy for any product quality issues. Warm tips: Do not use a high current adapter to charge the headlamp, lest it be damaged.

name: Coast® XPH34R 2075 Lumen USB-C Rechargeable-Dual Power LED Headlamp withPURE Beam® Twist Focus™ and Magnetic Base
short_description: PURE BEAM TWIST FOCUS: Pack two powerful beams into one and seamlessly transition—with no halos or hot spots—between short and long-range viewing. COAST’s patented focusing technology adapts to your need. The Ultra View Flood beam delivers edge-to-edge clarity in a broad circle, and the BULLS-EYE Spot beam sends a sharp ray of light at a distance with a transitional halo around the spot to increase the effective viewing area

RECHARGEABLE-DUAL POWER: Each coast Rechargeable-Dual Power product comes with a ported ZITHION-X rechargeable battery or a non-ported ZITHION rechargeable battery and is compatible with either Coast Extreme Performance alkaline batteries or other brand-name battery types, depending on the product. This provides you the cost savings of using rechargeable and the flexibility of reverting to alkaline

DETACHABLE HEADLAMP WITH MAGNETIC TAILCAP: This headlamp is built from top-grade aluminum and features a dust-resistant and storm proof body that rolls in its bracket for dynamic directional lighting—which can also detach to become a handheld flashlight with a built-in magnetic tail cap and real-time power indicator
SPECS: 2075 Lumen Max Light Output, 195 Meter (639 ft) Max Beam Distance, and 36 Hour Max Runtime
TOUGH & RELIABLE: Backed by the COAST lifetime warranty against defects in materials and workmanship. IP54 rated design for water resistance and durable body for 1-meter drop protection.
product_description: Go hands-free or hands-on with the brightest headlamp in our XPH line. Built to be worn or held in your hand, the Coast XPH34R peaks at 2075 lumens on Turbo Mode and features a dust-resistant and storm proof aluminum body that rolls in its bracket for directional lighting and also detaches to become a full-featured flashlight with a magnetic tail cap and built-in power indicator. The Coast patented Pure beam optical system with Twist focus enables seamless transitions between Ultra view flood beam and bulls-eye Spot Beam. For versatility on the job, this Rechargeable Dual Power flashlight runs on a Coast ZITHION-X rechargeable battery (charging cable included) but can also operate on disposable lithium or alkaline batteries (purchased separately)—creating a go-anywhere lighting solution featuring the patented Pure beam system and Twist focus optic for seamless transitions between Ultra View Flood Beam and Bulls-eye Spot Beam.
